#summary JDropDownButton

= JDropDownButton =

[https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-tXFWwRSy6Nk/T3VhkZ-NitI/AAAAAAAAAnQ/bNqbhLu86nc/h120/jDropDownButton.png]

{{{
JDropDownButton jDropDownButton1 = new JDropDownButton();
jDropDownButton1.setText("jDropDownButton 1");
JMenuItem jMenuItem1=new JMenuItem("hello");
JMenuItem jMenuItem2=new JMenuItem("hi");
jDropDownButton1.add(jMenuItem1);
jDropDownButton1.add(jMenuItem2);
}}}

To remove a JMenuItem
{{{
jDropDownButton1.remove(jMenuItem1);
}}}

Get the instance of the JPopupMenu
{{{
jDropDownButton1.getjPopupMenu()
}}}

Event - to detect you have clicked the button or the jmenuitem
{{{
if (jDropDownButton1.getEventSource() != null) {
	if (jDropDownButton1.getEventSource() == jMenuItem1) {
		System.out.println("jMenuItem1");
	} else if (jDropDownButton1.getEventSource() == jMenuItem2) {
		System.out.println("jMenuItem2");
	}
} else {
	System.out.println("button clicked");
}
}}}
